_meta.description: GPNet feature ledger - tracks implementation status of all major features

cases_worker_management.notes: Core entity management for workers and cases. Tables: worker_cases, users. Routes: /api/cases/*

case_detail_panel.notes: Frontend case detail view with tabs: Overview, Timeline, Certificates, Documents, Notes, Actions. Located in client/src/components/

certificate_ingestion.notes: Medical certificate upload, parsing, and storage. Table: medical_certificates. Routes: /api/cases/:id/certificates

certificate_compliance_monitoring.notes: Tracks certificate validity, expiry, and generates compliance flags. Fields: hasCertificate, complianceIndicator, complianceJson

timeline_engine.notes: Unified event timeline aggregating certificates, notes, attachments, milestones. Route: /api/cases/:id/timeline. Storage method: getCaseTimeline()

discussion_notes.notes: Case discussion notes with AI summarization. Tables: case_discussion_notes, case_discussion_insights

action_queue.notes: Pending actions management (chase_certificate, worker_checkin, host_followup). Derives from compliance state

freshdesk_sync.notes: Bidirectional Freshdesk integration. Service: server/services/freshdesk.ts. Handles ticket ingestion and case linking

freshdesk_email_processing.notes: Email parsing, attachment extraction, worker matching from Freshdesk tickets

smart_summary_engine.notes: AI-generated case summaries. Service: server/services/summary.ts. Route: /api/cases/:id/summary. Fields: aiSummary, aiSummaryGeneratedAt

claims_avatar_engine.notes: AI-driven worker interview system. Service: server/services/avatarPipeline.ts. Collects structured narrative data

avatar_pipeline_fallback.notes: A2F/FLAME to LivePortrait fallback logic. Types in shared/schema.ts: AvatarPipelineConfig, AvatarPipelineStatus

clinical_evidence_evaluation.notes: Evidence gap detection and clinical flags. Service: server/services/clinicalEvidence.ts. Types: ClinicalEvidenceEvaluation, ClinicalEvidenceFlag

clinical_action_recommendations.notes: Recommended actions based on clinical evidence gaps. Service: server/services/clinicalActions.ts. Types: ClinicalActionRecommendation

rtw_plan_management.notes: Return-to-work plan creation and tracking. Status field: rtwPlanStatus. Includes phased hours, duty restrictions

rtw_progress_monitoring.notes: Monitors RTW plan execution, detects unsafe duties, too-fast progression. Triggers plan adjustments

termination_process.notes: HR incapacity termination workflow. Table: termination_processes. Service: server/services/termination.ts. Routes: /api/termination/*

termination_document_generation.notes: Pre-termination and termination letter generation. Tables: document_templates, generated_documents

weekly_checkins.notes: Periodic worker health check-ins (pain, mood, function, concerns). Feeds into risk scoring and summaries

behaviour_sentiment_tracking.notes: Worker engagement and sentiment analysis from emails, transcripts, check-ins. Outputs sentiment trend and flags

predictive_risk_scoring.notes: ML-based risk level prediction. Fields: riskLevel, clinicalEvidence.flags. Informs case prioritization

case_duration_prediction.notes: Forecasts time to RTW or case closure based on injury characteristics and intervention quality

medical_constraints_tracking.notes: Tracks worker restrictions (no lifting, no bending, etc.) and positive capacity markers. Type: MedicalConstraints

functional_capacity_tracking.notes: Tracks worker functional limits (lift kg, stand/sit minutes, work hours). Type: FunctionalCapacity

specialist_status_tracking.notes: Tracks specialist referrals, appointments, reports. Type: SpecialistStatus, SpecialistReportSummary

case_attachments.notes: Document/attachment storage and retrieval. Table: case_attachments. Routes: /api/cases/:id/attachments

audit_logging.notes: Security and action audit trail. Table: audit_events. Type: AuditEvent

user_authentication.notes: JWT-based auth with role-based access. Tables: users. Controllers: server/controllers/auth.ts. Routes: /api/auth/*

dashboard_views.notes: Main dashboard showing case lists, action queue, compliance alerts. Located in client/src/pages/

recovery_timeline_chart.notes: Visual representation of certificate history and capacity changes over time. Type: RecoveryTimelineResponse
